msg: NO-JIRA: made Main a JUnit test that also stops the driver, laying the groundwork for getting some proper tests up and running

author: uschindler
msg: SOLR-5022: Make the Maven build also automatically populate the tests.disableHdfs property by a build profile. Otherwise the maven build fails by default on Windows.
